channel.title: Open Academic Environment Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Uncovering impactful connections between technology and education in building an academic network of collaboration, discussion and feedback
channel.itunes:author: Apereo OAE
channel.itunes:summary: Higher Ed interview series and discussion panel with authority figures from educational technology, academic research, university management, policy makers to educators and instructors
channel.description: The OAE Podcast is an interview series and discussion panel where we talk to authority figures within higher education about technology, academic research, university management, policy makers to educators and instructors

item.title: Innovation within Institutional IT
item.itunes:author: Apereo OAE
item.itunes:subtitle: Nicolaas Matthijs talks to us about building IT innovation within a higher education context
item.itunes:summary: We celebrate our inaugural episode by talking to Nicolaas Matthijs, the Project Lead for the Apereo Foundationâ€™s Open Academic Environment Project and an entrepreneur, Full Stack developer, Open Source contributor and Educational Technology enthusiast with significant experience on all sides of the EdTech fence. He is someone who continually pushes the barriers when it comes to technology for higher education. Nicolaas shares his perspectives on the challenges, innovations and where he sees technology best serving the eco-system of learning, research and collaboration for Universities in the modern world. Follow Nicolaas at @nicolaasm and join the conversation through oaeproject.org or @OAEProject on Twitter.
